## validPillbugMoves() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get all valid moves for the tile at the given coordinate acting as a pillbug.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validPillbugMoves(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of hex coordinates.

## Remarks

The pillbug rules state that the pillbug can move only one space per turn.
